headline: Bishal Bazar Company Limited has postponed its upcoming 34th AGM until further notice.

3,96,08,600.00 Additional Unit of (Promoter share of Nepal Government) has been listed in NEPSE - Bishal Bazar Company Limited (BBC)
Bishal Bazar Company Limited has appointed Shree Prabhu Capital Limited as its share registrar.
